extendedInfo.description: PLEASE NOTE:There is an issue with Gingerbread 2.3.3 that prevents Mobile Signal Widget from working correctly.  There is nothing I can do to fix this; the problem is with the Android API.    Mobile Signal Widget PRO now available!PRO version includes transparency option, new 2x1 widget and more. Check it out in the market.Shows real-time mobile signal strength in dBm, operator, network type and Wi-Fi signal.NEW - Unfreeze! Widgets. Tap a frozen widget to get it going again.

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on galaxy s2
reviews.comment: I\'m running android 2.3.5 and it won\'t show the signal strength.  Must be a galaxy s2 thing as none of the widgets I have tried have worked...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great way to tell if I\'m getting HSPA or 3G! Would be 5 stars if the E/3G/H didn\'t randomly disappear.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works fine. But.... What is the point? Same info as the top section of the phone gives. What I expected was the ability to see other providers.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: doesn\'t seem to work for me
reviews.comment: had this for a few days on my galaxy S3 and always tells me I\'ve got no or next to no signal. maybe needs an update to work on ice cream sandwich.  shame
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I paid the $.99 for the upgrade. Now I can see my wifi strength and my cell signal strength at the same time. Samsung Transform user.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: works like it should, not visually appealing but it gets the job done-htc evo 4g
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: It help me the troubled of going to status and check the dbm. With this I don\'t have to. Don\'t trust the phone stock bar, inaccurate, trust the dbm number very accurate for dropped call or not.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: SUPER DAVE
reviews.comment: Great little signal widget! I have had it for about a month or so. Put it on my homescreen and left it. Perfect! (Samsung vibrant 2.2)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Hehe, all these people who don\'t even know how to use android. :shakes head in shame: ...anyways, it always freezes on my HTCDesireZ/CM7, gingsupport?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Worked fine on my MT4G with cyanogenmod 7 (android 2.3.3). Probably wouldn\'t pay anything for what you get with the pro version, though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: HSDPA icon too big
reviews.comment: The HSDPA icon is too big and obscures the signal bars. Would be good if there are colours to indicate : 1) signal strength 2) Uploading/downloading data
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works
reviews.comment: Does what it says, i just wish the widget would stop freezing. SGS2 E4GT
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very acurate... helps me a lot when I wanna know if I could watch YouTube videos in HD... Mytouch slide
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Major bug
reviews.comment: The majority of the market has moved to Gingerbread. If an app doesn\'t work... then what\'s the point in offering it???  Not working on Galaxy Note.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Accurate but broken on certain Android software
reviews.comment: This widget presents a very easy to read dBm reading for my 3G signal, which is great as it updates in real-time as I move around. However, on GINGERBREAD, it froze literally 4 to 6 times a day. Before my device got Android 4.0, I I had to select \"Unfreeze widget!\" every few hours. Good that it works in Ice Cream Sandwich, but bad that some people on Gingerbread are forced to deal with issues.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Kinda sucks little too small could have made bigger to fit the grid more fully
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It has worked pretty good for my android
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Pointless not accurate when in low signal areas. It says I have nothing but I\'m still making calls and getting online.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Can this widget recognize the difference between HSPDA and HSPA+ if it does then im buying
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good, but small.
reviews.comment: This is gonna sound strange, but I wish it was 2x2 sized. I\'m blind yo.
reviews.author: A Google User
